business.title: Business
business.description: Represents a single business entity or organization.

ownerId.description: The UID of the user who owns this business.

employees.description: An array of email addresses for users who are employees.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the business was created.

branch.title: Branch
branch.description: Represents a physical or logical location within a business.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the branch was created.

employee.title: Employee
employee.description: Represents an employee of a business, linked to a user account. The document ID for an employee is their user UID.

name.description: The full name of the employee.

email.description: The employee's email address, used for inviting them.

branchId.description: The ID of the branch the employee is assigned to.

role.description: The role of the employee within the business.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the employee was added.

item.title: Inventory Item
item.description: Represents an item in the inventory. It can be a finished product or a raw component.

quantity.description: The current stock quantity. Not applicable for products with recipes.

value.description: The monetary value of a single unit of the item.

unitType.description: The unit of measurement for the quantity.

itemType.description: The type of item: a sellable Product or a raw Component.

categoryId.description: The ID of the category this item belongs to.

expirationDate.description: The expiration date of the item, if applicable.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the item was added.

category.title: Item Category
category.description: A category for organizing inventory items.

color.description: A hex or HSL color code for the category.

showInSales.description: Whether this category should appear on the sales page.

recipe.title: Recipe
recipe.description: Defines the components and quantities needed to make a product.

productId.description: The ID of the finished product item.

productName.description: The name of the finished product.

components.description: An array of components that make up the product.

itemId.description: The ID of the component item.

quantity.description: The quantity of the component needed.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the recipe was created.

inventoryHistory.title: Inventory History Log
inventoryHistory.description: A log entry for a change in inventory.

userProfile.title: User Profile
userProfile.description: Represents a user's public profile information.

supplier.title: Supplier
supplier.description: Represents a supplier or vendor for inventory components.

purchaseOrder.title: Purchase Order
purchaseOrder.description: A purchase order to a supplier for components.

/businesses/{businessId}/suppliers/{supp.description: Sub-collection for suppliers within a business.

/businesses/{businessId}/branches/{branc.description: Sub-collection for branches within a business.

/businesses/{businessId}/employees/{empl.description: Sub-collection for employees within a business. The document ID is the employee's user UID.

/businesses/{businessId}/branches/{branc.description: Sub-collection for inventory items within a branch.
Sub-collection for categories within a branch.
Sub-collection for recipes within a branch.
Sub-collection for inventory history logs within a branch.
Sub-collection for purchase orders within a branch.

/users/{userId}.description: Collection to store user profile information.
